Uses of Class
org.cojen.boxtin.RulesBuilder.ClassScope

  • Uses of RulesBuilder.ClassScope in org.cojen.boxtin

    Methods in org.cojen.boxtin that return RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowAll()
    Allow access to all constructors and locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowAllConstructors()
    Allow access to all constructors, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowAllMethods()
    Allow access to all locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowMethod(String name)
    Allow access to all variants of the given method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowVariant(Class<?>... paramTypes)
    Allow access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.allowVariant(String descriptor)
    Allow access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAll()
    Deny access to all constructors and locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAll(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all constructors and locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllConstructors()
    Deny access to all constructors, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllConstructors(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all constructors, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllMethods()
    Deny access to all locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllMethods(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyMethod(String name)
    Deny access to all variants of the given method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyMethod(DenyAction action, String name)
    Deny access to all variants of the given method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyVariant(Class<?>... paramTypes)
    Deny access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyVariant(String descriptor)
    Deny access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope

    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyVariant(DenyAction action, String descriptor)
    Deny access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.forClass(Class<?> clazz)
    End the current rules for this class and begin a new class scope.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.forClass(String name)
    End the current rules for this class and begin a new class scope.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.PackageScope.forClass(Class<?> clazz)
    Define specific rules against the given class, which can supersede all previous rules.
